DOC.detailed_description: A total 100 elderly patient schedule elective supratentorial craniotomy propofol-remifentanil total intravenous anaesthesia randomly divide either TEAS group ( receive stimulation LI4 , PC6 , LU7 , LU5 , LI18 ST9 acupoints , 2/10Hz , 6-15 mA ) Sham group ( receive stimulation ) . The primary outcome haemodynamic parameter plasma concentration epinephrine ( E ) , norepinephrine ( NE ) cortisol ( Cor ) . The secondary outcome consumption remifentanil propofol , time discontinuation anesthetic extubation reorientation , extubation quality score , quality postoperative recovery postoperative complication .
